Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.main.utils.interactions.items

Class StandardColorSensor

java.lang.Object
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.main.utils.interactions.InteractionSurface
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.main.utils.interactions.items.InteractionItem
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.main.utils.interactions.items.StandardColorSensor
public class StandardColorSensor extends InteractionItem
A StandardColorSensor detects colors. It returns all of its colors in the range between 0-255.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StandardColorSensor​(HardwareMap hardware, String name)
    Creates a new StandardColorSensor, which can sense colors.

    • getGSV

      public int getGSV()
      Gets the GSV value of the sensor, also known as grayscale.
      Returns:
      The GSV value of the sensor

    • getARGB

      public int getARGB()
      Gets the ARGB value of the sensor. This is NOT the same as getRGBA(). The ARGB value is a packed 32-bit integer (to be interpreted as unsigned) containing all 4 color channels. It can be unpacked via bitshifting and bitmasking.
      Returns:
      The ARGB value of the sensor
